Information on the common Game Board for both [[Peg Puzzle]] and [[Save The Network]] games.

projRes:/pegPuzSTNboard.png

---++++ Notes

   * Blue area marks the network (STN)
   * Orange area marks bots (STN)
   * Diagonal moves are not used in Peg Puzzle
   * Peg Puzzle starts with the board filled with pegs, except for center peg (17)
   * Numbering system is set by the user
